ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | chrcl.c | |- C = ( chr ` R ) |

| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 2, 3, 1 | #P_chrval | |- ( ( od ` R ) ` ( 1r ` R ) ) = C |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 2 | #P_odcl | |- ( ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Base ` R ) -> ( ( od ` R ) ` ( 1r ` R ) ) e. NN0 ) |
